Description: Fragment of an off-white glazed composition tile, decorated with a brown-red painted representation of a quail's head.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Amarna, el-, TA:21/68 (?) Main City, House O.48.16 (?)
Curator's comments: Peet & Woolley, City of Akhenaten I:28
Exhibition history: 2012 7 December - 13 April 2013, Berlin, Neues Museum, In the Light of Amarna
